A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
They didn't respect what was set up in the Force Awakens\,
The movie was slow and had many things happen just to push "plot" forward.
I feel they didn't watch the original trilogy to understand how Luke would react\, I personally don't consider this film Canon\, they should have gone with what was already written in books\, the expanded universe had many better stories than this one. 
I really hope they fix this in episode 9\, but I don't have my hopes up. 

Right after watching this movie in the Theater I couldn't even comment on everything I didn't like\, my group of friends and I all were kind of lost\, I rewatched twice to see if it got any better... it didn't.. this is a bad film.

Only pros\, it's beautifully shot\, but even then\, I find the CG was prequelish and not as good as Force Awakens.
